citation: Proclamation under the Local Government Amendment Act 2005 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government Amendment Act 2005

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Local Government Amendment Act 2005 fix 1 July 2006 as the day on which section 156 of that Act commences.

19 June 2006

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Local Government and Community Development

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 June 2006

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
